## All downloader :
## Instalation :
```bash
> npm i rahad-all-downloader
```

## Example (all downloader request)
```js
const { alldl } = require('rahad-all-downloader');

const videoUrl = ''; // Insert a supported URL from YouTube, Facebook, TikTok, Instagram, Twitter, Google Drive, or Capcut.

async function downloadVideo(url) {
  try {
    const result = await alldl(url);
    console.log(result);// all response same
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

downloadVideo(videoUrl);
```

# Installation

## You can install
`rahad-all-downloader` using npm:

```bash
npm install rahad-all-downloader
``` 

## rahad-media-downloader

## Instalation :
```bash
> npm i rahad-media-downloader
```

## Example (Facebook)
```js
const fb = require('rahad-media-downloader');

const facebookUrl = 'https://www.facebook.com/share/v/Bbc4kPH9t1XXSJrA/?mibextid=oFDknk';

async function mainFB() {
  try {
    const result = await fb.rahadfbdl(facebookUrl);
    console.log(result);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

mainFB();
```

## Example (TikTok)
```js
const tik = require('rahad-media-downloader');

const tiktokUrl = 'https://vt.tiktok.com/ZSFtDDGwa/';

async function main() {
  try {
    const result = await tik.rahadtikdl(tiktokUrl);
    console.log(result);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

main();
```

## Example (Instagram)
```js
const insta = require('rahad-media-downloader');

const instaUrl = 'https://www.instagram.com/reel/C5xU8OoRwdd/?igsh=MTM1MzF0M2szMTEwdg==';

async function main() {
  try {
    const result = await insta.rahadinsta(instaUrl);
    console.log(result);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

main();

```

## Example (YouTube)
```js
const insta = require('rahad-media-downloader');

const yturl = 'https://youtu.be/keikiWq-a7Q?si=g3KdH-e9tiE_JK7Z';

async function main() {
  try {
    const result = await insta.rahadytdl(yturl);
    console.log(result);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

main();

```

``` 
}
```
## Example (GDriveLink )
```js
const insta = require('rahad-media-downloader');

const drivelink = 'https://drive.google.com/file/d/1CUZIlfk1owwUElY55d6DVsdAHjfYvz4F/view?usp=drivesdk';

async function main() {
  try {
    const result = await insta.gdriveLink (drivelink);
    console.log(result);
  } catch (error) {
    console.error('Error:', error.message);
  }
}

main();

``` 
## Output Example (drivelink)
``` 
{
  "metadata": {
    "Author": "Mohammad Rahad",
    "message": "any problem please contact me",
    "Facebook": "https://www.facebook.com/md.rahad.hosain18"
  },
  "data": "https://drive.usercontent.google.com/download?id=1CUZIlfk1owwUElY55d6DVsdAHjfYvz4F&export=download"
}
```
# Installation

## You can install `rahad-media-downloader` using npm:

```bash
npm install rahad-media-downloader
```
